body.class: mediawiki ltr ns-6 ns-subject page-File_Flag_of_Sri_Lanka_svg skin-vector

div.p: Flag_of_Sri_Lanka.svg‎ (SVG file, nominally 1,200 × 600 pixels, file size: 18 KB)

This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons. Information from its description page there is shown below.
Commons is a freely licensed media file repository. You can help.

a.title: This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons

img.alt: This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons

p.style: width:30em; border:2px solid #55b05a; margin:1px 0; background:#fff; color:#000;

div.p: W3C ✓ The source code of this SVG is valid

th.style: background: #ccf; text-align: right; vertical-align: top; padding-right: 0.4em; width: 15%

td.div: English: The flag of Sri Lanka
Deutsch: Die Flagge von Sri Lanka

th.style: background: #ccf; text-align: right; padding-right: 0.4em; white-space: nowrap

td.p: SLS 693 - National flag of Sri Lanka

table.style: width:100%; clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; background-color:#f7f8ff; border:2px solid #8888aa; direction: ltr;

span.i: This image has been released into the public domain by its author, Zscout370. This applies worldwide.

span.small: In some countries this may not be legally possible; if so:
span.i: Zscout370 grants anyone the right to use this work for any purpose, without any conditions, unless such conditions are required by law.

p.span: Alemannisch | العربية | Беларуская (тарашкевіца) | Български | Català | Česky | Deutsch | Ελληνικά | English | Español | Eesti | فارسی | Suomi | Français | עברית | Magyar | Italiano | 日本語 | 한국어 | Lietuvių | Македонски | മലയാളം | Malti | Plattdüütsch | Nederlands | Polski | Português | Português do Brasil | Русский | Српски / Srpski | Svenska | தமிழ் | ไทย | Türkçe | Українська | Vèneto | Tiếng Việt | 中文 | ‪中文(简体)‬ | ‪中文(繁體)‬ | +/−

div.p: Click on a date/time to view the file as it appeared at that time.

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 08:45, 11 February 2010

td.span: (Munsell colors from http://www.eonet.ne.jp/~s-inoue/CO6_henkan/index-a.html (based from the document mentioned in this file))

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 22:21, 4 January 2010

td.span: (The lion and sword came from File:Coat of arms of Sri Lanka.svg; I drew the leaves based on the document I was emailed. Not sure what to do about colors since they are in CIE and Munsell (I know the Japanese use Munsell, so we should ask them).)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 20:36, 4 January 2010

td.span: (I received "SLS 693 - National flag of Sri Lanka" from the Sri Lanka Standards Institution. This is an overhaul of the image; working on minor details later. Colors will also come later, since they are in CIE and Munsell.)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 11:29, 11 February 2006

td.span: (colours and the approximate size of the lion from http://www.flag.de/FOTW/flags/lk.html)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 07:23, 5 February 2006
Thumbnail for version as of 08:46, 30 January 2006
Thumbnail for version as of 23:15, 24 November 2005

td.span: (Flag of Sri Lanka from the [http://openclipart.org/ Open Clip Art] website. {{PD-OpenClipart}} Category:SVG flags)
